header.title: SwasthyaBot

hero.title: Your Personal AI Health Companion
hero.description: SwasthyaBot provides instant health insights, symptom analysis, and helps you identify fake health news, all in one place. An initiative by the Ministry of Health, Govt. of Odisha.

footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is an AI-powered tool for informational purposes only and not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult a healthcare provider for any medical concerns.
